jdbcService.sql: select * from ~accounts a join ~users u on a.id = u.id join ~nodes n on u.id = n.id join (select ug.user_id, count(gr.role_id) as amount from ~group_roles gr join ~nodes n on gr.node_id = n.id and (:nodeId is null or n.id = :nodeId) join ~groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = g.id where (:nodeId is null or gr.node_id = :nodeId or (n.path like '%' || :nodeId || '%' and gr.inherit = true)) and (:roleId is null or gr.role_id = any(:roleId)) group by ug.user_id) m on m.user_id = u.id where m.amount >= :amountOfRolesToMatch and (:q is null or lower(u.alias) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(a.given_name) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(a.family_name) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(a.phone_number) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(a.email) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' ) and (:realm is null or u.realm = any(:realm))
